metadata.title: CVE-2023-3733 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in WebApp Installs in Google Chrome prior to115.0.5790.98 allowed a remote attacker to potentially spoof the contentsof the Omnibox (URL bar) via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium securityseverity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
